Control.Text: Welcome to WeightMate! WeightMate is an addon designed to give you a brief at-a-glance comparison of similar items, helping you decide whether that small drop in Brutality is worth the gain in Tech!
This addon does NOT compare an item's quality and it is NOT a good way to tell if an item is better or worse than another; the information it gives is for you to act upon accordingly!
Planned for the next big release is the ability to add custom stat caps (soft and hard) as well as integration with quest rewards!
WeightMate is made by Brucey of Eko (EU). If you have any suggestions, want to report an issue or just want a chat then feel free to hit me up!

Pixie.Text: Stats that you haven't explicitly tracked will use this weight.
Bored of waiting for your queue to pop? Want the epic excitement of minesweeper in Wildstar? Download WildSweeper today!

Control.Name: StatWarningButton
Control.Tooltip: Click to find out why this might be bad!

Control.Text: All primary stats are converted into secondary stats (which ones depend on your class) and do nothing on their own. Tracking these separately could make the build very unreliable and messy if you are not too careful; it might just be safer to track those secondary stats directly.
Control.Name: BodyText
